title: Off-Topic - MASCDACS
content:
Does anyone here know what MASCDACS stands for?

I happen to be putting together a piece on Vince Sardi, who passed away last month. (You Manhattanites and tourists to Manhattan surely have heard of Sardi’s?)

I keep coming across that he was very supportive of this group. I think they have something to do with car racing - but I also know that he was very much involved in the world of theater?

I was hoping there was a typographer around who has that piece of trivia and would share... hey, I’d do the same... it was amazing how much info one could pick up at a type shop. (Trying to bring it back to topic :-)

Thanking you in advance for your help.

and of course, RIP Vince...

author: Jackie T

comments.content:
Nevermind — I should have known...

A club near and dear to my heart - and I’ve never seen it as an acronym before...

Madison Avenue Sports Car Driving and Chowder Society

known as the Chowder Club and still to this day meets at — yep, you guessed it — Sardi’s.
